an9.65:1.1: “Mendicants, there are these five kinds of sensual stimulation.
an9.65:1.3: Sights known by the eye that are likable, desirable, agreeable, pleasant, sensual, and arousing.
an9.65:1.7: Touches known by the body that are likable, desirable, agreeable, pleasant, sensual, and arousing.
an9.65:1.8: These are the five kinds of sensual stimulation.
an9.65:2.1: To give up these five kinds of sensual stimulation you should develop the four kinds of mindfulness meditation. …”
